body.name: EZETAI Camera for Home Security Indoor,Outdoor Backyard Camera Kids Monitoring Camera Indoor Camera Wireless Battery Powered with Phone app Security Camara inalambrica para exteriores
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 16 mins
features: 【100% Wire-Free & Rechargeable Battery】EZETAI outdoor security camera equips with an upgraded rechargeable battery that provides longer monitoring time without the need for frequent charging and without the annoying problem of wires. You can install it anywhere you like.

【Smart PIR Motion Detection】With advanced PIR sensing technology, this wireless battery camera turns on Humanoid Marker and Human Face Marker according to you in the "EseeCloud" app.This outdoor wireless security camera will only notify when it detects a target object and filter useless information.

【2-way Audio & Multiple Remote View Access】Noise cancellation speaker & microphone make interactive communication possible: talk with your family, kids, courier while you are not at home. Device sharing allows your family members to view EZETAI surveillance wireless cameras for home security simultaneously.

【3.0MP/2034*1296P Full HD & Night Vision 】3.0MP/2034*1296P Wi-Fi outdoor camera wireless shows every detail with a wide-angle of 120 °and 33ft night vision range, which can greatly reduce blind spots. With 9pcs 850nm IR-LEDs, you can easily observe what is happening in your garden/garage/living room/doorway. This battery home security cameras outdoor should be enough to protect your property and family.

【Waterproof IP66 & Storage】: The outdoor security camera wireless has IP66 waterproof protection and can be placed outside. Support local Micro-SD card storage up to 128GB(not included). If you have any questions after receiving the camera, please find our customer service team on manual instruction.
body.description: Remote Viewing Anytime & Anywhere EZETAI F1 Wireless Surveillance Camera System to the internet, even if you travel on the other side of the earth,you can get real-time images of your home and hear family through the “EseeCloud” App.Download free App “EseeCloud” from Google Play or Apple App Store.Support iPhone, IPAD, or Android work. FAQ： Q: Does it use 5g or 2.4 g wifi? A: The device requires 2.4G Wi-Fi connection. 5G Wi-Fi is not supported. Q: Does it record 24/7 when no motion is detected? A: F1 security camera defaults to records when motion detected. If you need to open 24/7 continuous recording, you need to use an external power supply to power it all the time. Q: How far is the night vision of the outdoor camera A: The night vision can reach 65ft（20m） far, while the detection distance of PIR(Passive Infra Red) sensor is 26 ft（8m）.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.7 3.7 out of 5 stars 101 ratings 3.7 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thank you for choosing the EZETAI outdoor wireless security camera! Catch them in the Act.Someone home who shouldn't be? Not for long. F1 wireless home security camera notifies you the instant it detects unusual activity, so you can see what happened and take action. Capture Critical Evidence.See what happened before, during, and after your smart home camera detects activity. With an optional recording plan, you can record, store and share critical footage with family and neighbors. See what's happening at home. Is everything alright at home? With F1 house security camera you can see and hear what's happening at home any time, anywhere, from any device. With an ultra-wide field of view—plus flawless streaming—you can see everything that happens at home in crystal clear HD from your smartphone or tablet. All for free in the Eseecloud app. Keep an eye outside.Use your F1 home security camera system wireless outdoor with our outdoor kit. It's got a weatherized wet suit to keep out rain, snow and dust, plus a 1m（3.2ft） power cable so you can keep it running day and night. Works from -4 to 114ºF. Detects humans.Ignores distractions.No one wants their phone to get overwhelmed with alerts. Shouldn't your camera know the difference between someone breaking in and a branch moving outside? We solved the "camera-cried-wolf" problem. F1 security camera intelligent detection algorithms are calibrated to detect the unique heat signature of humans, so the alerts you get are the ones that matter. Flawless StreamingHD. Now wait-free.What good is HD video if it's choppy, grainy and slow? Here's a secret. To get crystal clear video, you need more than HD resolution. F1 bullet surveillance cameras camera secret sauce is its "H.265”compression. Under the same pixel and bit rate, the video storage of H.265 encoding is 50% of the traditional H.264.About half of the storage space.

App download and Firmware upgrade "Eseecloud" App download : Scan the QR code on the right to download and install the " EseeCloud"APP; Or search for the "EseeCloud' App in the Apple App store and Android Google play store to download and install.(Apple and Android users use the same QR code). Firmware upgrade: Customers who have purchased our products can upgrade to the highest version online through the APP, without downloading software, just click to upgrade. After the upgrade, the machine functions can be improved, the camera stability can be enhanced, and the vulnerabilities can be patched. We also recommend upgrading the product firmware to the latest version before use.

Remote Viewing Anytime & Anywhere APP name：EseeCloud APP Key Functions Easy to setup Real-time live view Playback recorded videos Motion detection instant alerts 2 way Audio Humanoid marker Human face marker Cloud storage Packing Listing 1 x Battery Security Camera1 x Bracket1 x USB Cable1 x Screws Set1 x Quick User Guide Remote Viewing Anytime & Anywhere EZETAI F1 Wireless Surveillance Camera System to the internet, even if you travel on the other side of the earth,you can get real-time images of your home and hear family through the “EseeCloud” App.Download free App “EseeCloud” from Google Play or Apple App Store.Support iPhone, IPAD, or Android work. FAQ： Q: Does it use 5g or 2.4 g wifi? A: The device requires 2.4G Wi-Fi connection. 5G Wi-Fi is not supported. Q: Does it record 24/7 when no motion is detected? A: F1 security camera defaults to records when motion detected. If you need to open 24/7 continuous recording, you need to use an external power supply to power it all the time. Q: How far is the night vision of the outdoor camera A: The night vision can reach 65ft（20m） far, while the detection distance of PIR(Passive Infra Red) sensor is 26 ft（8m）.

4 privacy zones-F1 security camera If a location of the scene does not want to be seen, you can cover it up so that it is not recorded. For example, a location that allows someone to enter a password to prevent it from being recorded and leaked. Up to 4 locations can be set. PIR motion detection-3.0MP Video with Motion Detection Equipped advanced PIR motion detection, this home security camera system is exactly what you need to protect your home and family. It's ideal for night/day use and starts recording to the mircor SD Card(NOT included, up to 128G, build-in SD Slot) after detecting motion. APP Control-wireless security camera indoor/outdoor 2.4g wifi Eseecloud APP makes it easy to manage your camera remotely from across the globe. Get full access and remote control of all camera functions at your fingertips. It allows you to easily view and check in on your homes, pets, loved ones or businesses, any time, anywhere.(Support iPhone, IPAD, or Android work).

100% Wireless and Cordless EZETAI indoor/outdoor surveillance cameras are completely wireless(2.4GHz WiFi）, no need to use wires for viewing streams or installing. Rechargeable security camera is powered by a built-in 5200mAH battery, allowing you to place it indoors and outdoors without worrying about annoying wires. (Only compatible with 2.4G WiFi router) Movement Alert Notifications-F1 wifi camera To ensure you're always in the know of what's going on when you're not there. PIR sensor detects any movement（children/pets/elder/Courier） and triggers alerts on your mobile so you know when you need to know. QHD Video Resolution&Night Vision 3.0MP/2304*1296P video with 120-degree wide -angle is very clear, you can see more details. You can see car licence, people thorough road and children play games. In evening, the wireless security camera will auto open night vision. The video and pictures will turn black and white. The wireless security camera protect your home day and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Rather virtual learning or working from home and video conferencing pc cameras are a must. This year I’ve been through a few none of which I cared to review as I sent them back until now.Pros: High quality video, camera lense cover, compact easy setup, fairly priced for the quality.Cons: Heavier than expected but that is because it’s frame is built very well so technically is it a con?? 😂Overall I am very happy with the cameras freeze frame shots, and crisp clear video.If you are in search for a pc camera I encourage you to get this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First one come in with WiFi not working had new one next day and works just fine .good quality like the soler charger. I don't like the fact that the camera times out and cuts off while watching live veiw

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the idea, but…
reviews.reviewText: I love the idea that I could use solar energy to power my camera. Especially because I wanted to mount it outside. Unfortunately, the solar panel didn’t keep it charged. I was so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars a waste of time
reviews.reviewText: the directions didn't match the product and were totally useless. When I finally found where the power button was hidden, not on the side like the directions indicated, the app couldn't connect with the camera no matter what method I tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera is the perfect solution to our backyard coverage. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a bit hard to set up the camera, but I did figure out that you have to charge the camera a little indoors when trying to scan the QR code. Once charged a bit, it will easily scan the code and connect to your phone. Aside from that, the camera has worked great! I have it outdoors for my dogs and the quality is great and so so amazing at night too. Battery has lasted all day and night. During the day it charges using the solar panel. Also it will send like screenshots of alerts (e.g. say somebody is captured on camera).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PICTURE QUALITY
reviews.reviewText: I bought 7 different cameras including this one. All with above 4 star reviews. I tried each individual camera with different settings. This camera came on top. I just can't believe how other cameras were getting any positive reviews.. Some of them were so horrible compare to this one that I was surprised to even see any positive reviews on them. Great camera, good picture. The only negative is it's size. This is probably the larges of them all. Remember, this is 90 degree wide angle, so your whole room will be visible.With that said, remember, this is still a chinese cheap usb camera. Not a brand name. What you pay is what you get. I didn't expect a high end camera for this much money, but quality did surprise me. I hope it lasts for at least a year or so...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Es fácil de instalar, te avisa si hay alguien y te saca screenshot. Pero en menos de un mes sale un error que hay que resetear y empatar con la app otra vez. Ya lo hecho 2 veces y la compré por si me iba de viaje. Si llega a pasar eso cómo voy a poder monitoriar desde lejos.

Kauft nicht bei diesem Hersteller, 3 Geräte in 18 Monaten getauscht, immer wieder neue Cloud Gebühren für 6 Monate und dann geht nichts mehr ! Im Betrieb war alles in Ordnung. Von Nachhaltigkeit keine Rede. sehr Schade.

Es handelt sich bereits um das zweite Gerät. Das erste ließ sich unproblematisch installieren und in Betrieb nehmen. Solarbetrieben arbeitet es zuverlässig und wartungsfrei. Voraussetzung ist natürlich, daß WLan zur Verfügung steht. Empfehlung! Die im Playstore angebotene und erforderliche App ist allerdings sehr unübersichtlich! Da gibt es deutlich bessere....

Die Kamera funktioniert gut der Ton ist allerdings sehr schlecht und sie nimmt bei Dunkelheit nicht alle Bewegungen auf. Tagsüber kann ich sie sehr empfehlen was noch störend ist ist dass sie mit der Solarfunktion nicht wirklich auflädt und man es doch alle drei Tage manuell machen darf dennoch eine super Sache

Ich als Techniklooser habe ein Wochenende gebraucht um die Verbindung zu meinem Internet hinzubekommen und die Cam per Handy App zu Nutzen.Bild- und Videoqualität sind genauso wie die Cam und Equipment absolut ein Traum!Der Bewegungsmelder ist ok, wenn man die Cam im Rahmen der Einbruchsicherheit nutzen möchte, Aufnahmen Tag und Nacht perfekt/Fernseher Qualität, Bewegungsmelder topp....geht es darum zu schauen ob sich Marder, Waschbären oder Füchse im Garten, Terasse oder an der Katzenklappe rumtreiben reicht der Bewegungsmelder nicht immer aus....
alles eingestellt wie beschrieben keine rückmeldung.
